dict.string:
# If TM_LATEX_MASTER not set use TM_FILEPATH [ -z "$TM_LATEX_MASTER" ] && export TM_LATEX_MASTER="$TM_FILEPATH"
# Switch to the right directory. cd "$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY" cd `dirname "$TM_LATEX_MASTER"` FILE=`basename "$TM_LATEX_MASTER"`
"${TM_TEX:=pdflatex}" -interaction=nonstopmode -file-line-error-style "$FILE" | "$TM_BUNDLE_PATH"/latexErrWarn.py echo echo "Previewing..." echo $FILE | perl -e 'while(<>){s/\.tex$/.pdf/;print;}' | xargs open -a TeXniscope
